Package edu.westmont.cs030.maze

Class MazeGenerator

java.lang.Object
edu.westmont.cs030.maze.MazeGenerator
public class MazeGenerator extends Object
Separate container for generating maze pathing and animating the generation process.

  • Constructor Summary

    Initializes the maze generators with parameters necessary for creating the maze and generating the paths within.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    generateMaze()
    Initializes the Maze using Maze.initialize() then calls the recursive generateMaze(Cell) method with the initial Cell from the Maze to begin the path generation process from.
    void

    Recursive maze generation algorithm based on Wikipedia's description of the process.

  • Constructor Details

    • MazeGenerator

      public MazeGenerator(int mazeHeight, int mazeWidth, int initRow, int initCol, boolean isShuffle, JTextComponent renderTarget, int renderDelayMillis)
      Initializes the maze generators with parameters necessary for creating the maze and generating the paths within.
      Parameters:
      mazeHeight - height of the maze in number of rows (including rows dedicated for displaying internal walls)
      mazeWidth - width of the maze in number of column (including columns dedicated for displaying internal walls)
      initRow - index of the row to begin the maze path generation from
      initCol - index of the column to begin the maze path generation from
      isShuffle - true if the path generation is randomized, false if the generation should be linear/sequential
      renderTarget - JTextComponent to output the rendered maze text to
      renderDelayMillis - milliseconds of delay to inject between each step of maze generation process

  • Method Details

    • getRenderTarget

      public JTextComponent getRenderTarget()
      Returns the GUI render target that was set at instantiation.
      Returns:
      A JTextComponent if the render target was set, null if unset.

    • generateMaze

      public void generateMaze()
      Initializes the Maze using Maze.initialize() then calls the recursive generateMaze(Cell) method with the initial Cell from the Maze to begin the path generation process from.

    • generateMaze

      public void generateMaze(Cell currCell)
      Recursive maze generation algorithm based on Wikipedia's description of the process.
      Parameters:
      currCell - current Cell to continue the maze path generation from
